title: Allocation Response
description: Flexible identification structure for allocations with multiple identifier options
$comment: This schema defines different valid combinations of allocation identifiers that can be used across the allocation workflow

allocationStatusCode.description: Status information for the allocation including processing codes
allocationStatusCode.$comment: Consult table ExternalAllocationInstructionStatus. Contains status codes and optional rule identification for rejected allocations

items.description: Error reason information for the allocation
items.$comment: Consult table ExternalErrorCodeAllocation. Contains error codes and optional rule identification for rejected allocations

accountOriginIdentification.description: Specifies the account from which the allocation originates

accountDestinationIdentification.description: Specifies the account to which the allocation is directed

quantity.description: Quantity expressed as a numeric value with up to 17 decimal places
